3-LINE

3-boom Aerials
3-boom Aerials
Triple-cradle structure aerials designed to enhance the
digital TV signal reception quality. The special elements
array allows to obtain an excellent frequency reply and an
increase of the S/N ratio thanks to improved vertical and
horizontal directivity and to better protection against
impulsive noises. Stark structure with pre-mounted full rod
elements, simple and quick to mount: it doesn't require
any tool. White anticorrosion treatment.
